metadata.title: CVE-2017-6311 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
gdk-pixbuf-thumbnailer.c in gdk-pixbuf allows context-dependent attackersto cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and applicationcrash) via vectors related to printing an error message.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6311` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-gdkpixbuf-2.0 - 2.32.2-1ubuntu1.3
libgdk-pixbuf2.0-0 - 2.32.2-1ubuntu1.3
libgdk-pixbuf2.0-common - 2.32.2-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gdk-pixbuf package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.32.2-1ubuntu1.3').
